ollamaIp.label: Ollama Server IP
ollamaIp.help: IP address of the Ollama server.

checkOllamaModelRunning.label: Check if Ollama model is running
checkOllamaModelRunning.help: Timer to check if the Ollama model is running. Set to 0 to disable.

useVectorDb.label: Use Qdrant
useVectorDb.help: Use Qdrant as vector database for Ollama.

vectorDbIp.label: Qdrant Server IP
vectorDbIp.help: IP address of the Qdrant server.

embeddingModel.label: Embedding Model
embeddingModel.help: Name of the Ollama embedding model to use.

maxContextResults.label: Max Context Results
maxContextResults.help: Maximum number of context results from vector database to include in chat.

enableDatapointControl.label: Enable Datapoint Control
enableDatapointControl.help: Allow AI models to automatically change datapoints based on their responses (e.g., '... ist jetzt anwesend').
